text: The Nightingale's Prayer (, translit. Doaa al-Karawan ; also called The Curlew's Cry) is a 1959 Egyptian romantic drama movie directed by Henry Barakat and was based on the novel by Taha Hussein. It stars Faten Hamama, Ahmed Mazhar, Ragaa Al Geddawy, Amina Rizk, Mimi Chakib, Zahrat El-Ola. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 romantic drama movies Category:Egyptian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry Barakat
title: The Nightingale's Prayer
